definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[שׂ]]: Jos 11:9 +, 3 fs. sf. [[שְׂרָפָ֫חַם]] Is 47:14, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשְׂרׂף]] Nu 19:5 + 2 t., more oft. [[וַיִּשְׂרׂף]] Ex 32:20 +, 2 mpl. [[תִּשְׂרְפוּן]] De 7:5 + 2 t.; Inf. abs. [[שָׂרוֹף]] 2Sa 23:7; cstr. [[שְׂרׂף]] Je 36:25 +; sf. [[שָׂרְפוֹ]] Ju Jdg 9:52, Am 2:1; Pt. act. [[שׂרֵף]] Le 16:28, Nu 19:8, pl. [[שׂרְפִים]] 2Ki 17:31; pass. mpl. [[שְׂרֻפִים]] Nu 17:4; fs. [[שְׂרוּפָה]] 1Sa 30:3, [[שְׂרֻפָה]] Ps 80:17, pl. [[שְׂרוּפוֹת]] Ne 3:24, cstr. [[שְׂרֻפוֹת]] Is 1:7;—burn (59 t. + [[בָּאֵשׁ]], 2 t. + [[בְּמוֹ־אֵשׁ]]):
in making bricks, + [[לִשְׂרֵפָה]] Ge 11:3 (J; obj. om.).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: c. acc. rei, usu. to destroy, e.g. door Ju Jdg 9:52, house Ju Jdg 12:1, 1Ki 16:18 (both c. [[עַל]] pers.), Je 39:8 + Je 39:11 t., cf. pt. pass. Ne 3:24, city Jos 6:24, 1Sa 30:1; 1Sa 30:14 + 16 t., cf. pt. pass. 1Sa 30:3, Is 1:7, chariots Jos 11:6, Jos 11:9, 2Ki 23:11, Ps 46:10 (subj. ´[[י]]:), idols, etc., Ex 32:20 (acc. om.), De 9:21 + 10 t., roll † Je 36:25, Je 36:27, Je 36:28, Je 36:29, Je 36:32, wood † Is 44:16, Is 44:19 (both + [[בְּמוֹ־אֵשׁ]]), cf. Ps 80:17 (fig.), Je 51:32, hair † Ez Eze 5:4; bones, to lime (as outrage) † Am 2:1; upon altars (in desecration) † 1Ki 13:2, 1Ki 23:16, 23:20 = 2Ch 34:5; bodies, as funeral rite † 1Sa 31:12 (rare custom, RS:Sem. i. 353; 2nd ed. 372; but Klo Bu rd. [[יִשְׂפְּדוּ]] [= ´[[יִס]]:]; cf. Benz:Arch. 163; Ency. Bib. DEAD Now:Arch. i. 188); ´[[שׂ]]: as funeral rite also (obj. om., prob. spices, cf. 2Ch 16:14), † c. [[ל]] pers. mort. Je 34:5, + acc. cogn. [[שְׂרֵפָה]] 2Ch 16:14 (cf. [[שְׂרֵפָה]]); in ceremonial of P (never of burning sacrif. on altar, [[הִקְטִיר]], cf. [[הֶעְֶלֶה]], but) chiefly (14 t.) of consuming refuse, esp. unused portions of victims, etc. (to prevent use), and infected objects, Ex 29:14, Ex 29:34 +, sts. [[מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה]] Le 4:12 (+ [[עַ־ָעֵחִים]]), v:Le 4:21, v:Le 4:21 + 4 t., etc., cf. Ez Eze 43:21; also of burning red heifer (to produce ashes for purification) Nu 19:5, Nu 19:5, Nu 19:3. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: burn, c. acc. pers., (1) as penalty Jos 7:25 (JE), Ju Jdg 14:15, Jdg 15:6, Le 20:14, cf. Nu 17:4 (pt. pass.), so, [[אֵשׁ]] subj., Is 47:14, c. acc. cogn. [[שְׂרֵפָה]] Le 10:6 (P); (2) as sacrifice, Je 7:31, Je 19:5; + [[ל]] dei De 12:31, 2Ki 17:31. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשָּׂרֵף]] Jos 7:15 +, 3 fpl. [[תִּשָּׂרַפְנׇה]] Pr 6:27, etc.;—be burned (11 t. + [[בָּאֵשׁ]]): of city Je 38:17 + v:Je 38:23 (read [[תִּשָּׂרֵף]] for [[תִּשְׂרׂף]] LXX SyrVer Targum Hi Ew Gf Gie Du), idols, etc., Mic 1:7, 1Ch 14:12; ritually (cf.

definitions.body: ad fin.) Le 4:12, Le 6:23, Le 7:17, Le 7:19, Le 13:52, Le 19:6; of pers., as penalty Ge 38:24 (J), Jos 7:15 (JE), 2Sa 23:7 (poet.), Le 21:9 (H). †

definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[שׂרָָף]], of goat Le 10:16 it was burnt up (and gone).
